source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000010_MERLWYB<tab>Ere we begin, I would like to offer my gratitude to Masters Thancred and Urianger. 'Tis no small feat to infiltrate the imperial capital and live to tell the tale, much less in times of civil war. Thanks to them, we may plot our course in full knowledge of how the winds blow in Garlemald.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000010_MERLWYB<tab>Thancred, Urianger, l'état-major mhigois nous a relayé les conclusions de votre enquête à Garlemald. Merci encore de vous être risqués en territoire ennemi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000020_URIANGER<tab>Full glad are we to have been of service. But verily, such dangers as we did encounter pale into insignificance next to those faced by our comrades. An Ascian armed with the might of Bahamut, bent on bringing about the Final Days...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000020_URIANGER<tab>Nous n'avons fait que notre devoir. Pendant ce temps, j'ai cru comprendre que vous aviez reçu ici même la visite d'un Ascien accompagné d'une sorte de Bahamut. Et qu'il aurait prophétisé l'apocalypse...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000030_RAUBAHN<tab>Theatrics. He sought only to make a show of the power at the Telophoroi's disposal.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000030_RAUBAHN<tab>Oui, il nous a lit<var 16 /var>té<var 16 /var>ra<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment déclaré la guerre, au nom de son groupuscule, les “Télophores”. Et puis il est aussitôt reparti.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000040_RAUBAHN<tab>But since then, we have seen no sign of this “Fandaniel,” or his wyrm. And while we've done what we can to bolster our defenses, there's no telling where he might strike next.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000040_RAUBAHN<tab>Contre toute attente, c'est le calme plat depuis. Nos cités-États redoublent de vigilance, mais n'ont détecté aucun signe de l'Ascien, ni de son “Luna-Bahamut”.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000050_KANESENNA<tab>Whenever and wherever it may be, we must use the intervening time to learn more of our enemy.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000050_KANESENNA<tab>Le calme avant la tempête, sans doute... Dans tous les cas, il n'est pas question de rester là sans rien faire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000060_KANESENNA<tab>'Twas with this in mind that we dispatched scouts to investigate the towers...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000060_KANESENNA<tab>Nous avons d'ores et déjà envoyé des troupes explorer chacune de ces fameuses “tours de l'apocalypse”, comme il convient désormais de les appeler.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000070_LYSE<tab>Our advance party took longer than expected to return...and when they did, they tried to kill us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000070_LYSE<tab>Nos éclaireurs sont revenus il y a peu. Je suis allée à leur rencontre et... c'est là qu'ils m'ont attaquée.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000080_LYSE<tab>Luckily, I'd seen that sort of thing before, and we were able to restrain them before they did any harm. Then it was just a matter of letting the porxies do their work.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000080_LYSE<tab>Cette espèce de transe dans laquelle ils étaient... J'avais déjà vu ça quelque part... Alors je les ai neutralisés, ligotés, puis on a essayé à tout hasard de les soigner avec un porxie. Et devinez quoi<var 1D /var>? Ça a fonctionné<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000090_ALISAIE<tab>Are you saying they were tempered?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000090_ALISAIE<tab>Ça voudrait dire... qu'ils étaient subjugués<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000100_LYSE<tab>Once they'd come back to their senses, they told us everything they could. It seems that just as they were getting close to the tower, they heard an earsplitting roar. And that was the last thing they remembered.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000100_LYSE<tab>À les croire, ils ont entendu une sorte de hurlement à l'approche de la tour. Après quoi, c'est le trou noir...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000110_LYSE<tab>But what worries me most is what they were saying right before they attacked.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000110_LYSE<tab>Autre chose. Lorsqu'ils se sont jetés sur moi, ils scandaient tous la même phrase.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000120_LYSE<tab>“Glory be to Garlemald.”
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000120_LYSE<tab>“Gloire à l'empire de Garlemald<var 1D /var>!”<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000130_URIANGER<tab>The tempered have heretofore ever been thralls to primal entities. Yet these hapless souls were compelled to accept a <var 1A 02 /var>nation<var 1A 01 /var> as the object of their devotion. This calleth into question all that we know of the condition.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000130_URIANGER<tab>En temps normal, les subjugués manifestent une ferveur fanatique vis-à-vis de leur divinité. Mais dans le cas présent, on dirait que c'est leur fibre patriotique qui est exacerbée, et envers une nation autre que la leur...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000140_AYMERIC<tab>Would that the unsettling news ended there. Alas, there is more. Following the earlier reports of missing Amalj'aa, we have learned that other beast tribes have suffered similar losses.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000140_AYMERIC<tab>Je dois vous faire part d'une autre nouvelle. C'est à propos des enlèvements d'hommes-bêtes. Nous avons découvert qu'ils ne concernent pas uniquement les Amalj'aa.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000150_AYMERIC<tab>And we now have reason to believe that the abductions are connected to the appearance of the towers.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000150_AYMERIC<tab>Et aussi... qu'ils sont très pro<var 16 /var>ba<var 16 /var>ble<var 16 /var>ment liés à ces fameuses tours.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000160_AYMERIC<tab>Our scouts sighted black-garbed figures leading shackled Ixal in the direction of the tower in Dravania.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000160_AYMERIC<tab>L'autre jour, nos sentinelles ont repéré un groupe d'hommes en noir escortant des prisonniers ixali. Ils marchaient en direction de la tour de l'apocalypse apparue à Dravania.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000170_AYMERIC<tab>The Temple Knights were able to intercept them before they could reach their destination, liberating the Ixal and apprehending their captors─each of whom was found to be equipped with Garlean arms and armor.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000170_AYMERIC<tab>Les templiers que j'ai envoyés sur place ont heureusement pu libérer les hommes-bêtes. Quant à leurs ravisseurs, nous avons retrouvé sur eux de nombreuses pièces d'équipement de fabrication impériale...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000180_GRAHATIA<tab>So the Empire is the common thread.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000180_GRAHATIA<tab>L'Empire est donc le dénominateur commun des deux affairrres qui nous intéressent...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000190_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>With the support of Zenos, it seems likely that Fandaniel has rallied a faction of the splintered Garlean army to the banner of the Telophoroi.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000190_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Zenos et Fandaniel se sont vraisemblablement donné le mot pour rallier les diverses factions dissidentes de Garlemald sous la bannière des Télophores.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000200_RAUBAHN<tab>Lord Hien reached the same conclusion when I shared our findings with Doma.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000200_RAUBAHN<tab>Nous avons partagé nos in<var 16 /var>for<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>tions avec Doma, et le seigneur Hien est arrivé à la même conclusion.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000210_RAUBAHN<tab>The plan had been to march on Garlemald from the east and west in order to force a peace treaty, but the situation has changed. Dealing with the threat of the towers must come first.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000210_RAUBAHN<tab>Avec la coalition orientale, nous envisagions à terme de prendre l'Empire en tenaille pour le forcer à accepter un armistice. Hélas, le problème des tours nous oblige à revoir nos priorités.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000220_RAUBAHN<tab>Given the nature of the enemy, and the proven risk of tempering, I could think of few suitable candidates to aid in this task. But I am confident in my choice.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000220_RAUBAHN<tab>C'est pourquoi nous avons fait appel à des intervenants qui, je l'espère, nous permettront de régler cela au plus vite.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000230_ALPHINAUD<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000230_ALPHINAUD<tab>Oh<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000240_RAUBAHN<tab>Resistant to primal influence as they are, they can investigate the towers without fear of being turned.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000240_RAUBAHN<tab>Leur résistance à l'influence des Primordiaux devrait en toute logique leur permettre d'explorer les tours sans craindre un lavage de cerveau.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000250_ARENVALD<tab>We're glad to put our gifts to use, Commander.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000250_ARENVALD<tab>Fordola a accepté de participer elle aussi. Nous irons en tandem.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000260_RAUBAHN<tab>Gifted or not, going behind enemy lines remains a perilous undertaking. But we must know more if we're to strike back at our foe. I'm counting on you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000260_RAUBAHN<tab>Ce ne sera pas de tout repos. Néanmoins, je compte sur vous pour percer à jour les desseins ennemis. En cas de succès, nous serons plus à même d'élaborer des contre-mesures efficaces.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000270_ARENVALD<tab>If it would give us the upper hand, I'd do it a hundred times over. We won't let you down.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000270_ARENVALD<tab>Si c'est dans l'intérêt de tout le monde, je suis prêt à me jeter dans la gueule du loup.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000280_RAUBAHN<tab>That concludes the briefing. You two─make ready and join your escort.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000280_RAUBAHN<tab>Je n'ai rien d'autre à ajouter. Arenvald, Fordola, allez vous préparer avant de rejoindre votre escorte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000290_ALPHINAUD<tab>Are you certain about this, Arenvald?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000290_ALPHINAUD<tab>Arenvald...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000300_ARENVALD<tab>I am. Come on, let's talk outside.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000300_ARENVALD<tab>Je sais, je sais, il faut qu'on discute. Allons-y, j'ai encore un peu de temps devant moi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000310_ARENVALD<tab>So you know, I've already gone through all the formalities at the Rising Stones. Made sure to inform J'moldva and V'mah at Rhalgr's Reach as well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000310_ARENVALD<tab>Tu sais, Tataru est au courant. J'ai même prévenu J'moldva et V'mah Tia à L'Étendue de Rhalgr.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000320_ALPHINAUD<tab>Arenvald, I admire your enthusiasm...but this is far more dangerous than anything you have done before.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000320_ALPHINAUD<tab>Je ne veux pas remettre en question ta décision. Mais infiltrer un bastion ennemi, comme ça, sans renforts... Tu réalises à quel point c'est risqué<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000330_ARENVALD<tab>I know the risks. And I also know what's in store if we don't stop Fandaniel from carrying out his plan.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000330_ARENVALD<tab>Raubahn a été on ne peut plus clair<var 1D /var>: ces tours préfigurent l'apocalypse, et seuls les individus dotés de pouvoirs protecteurs peuvent y pénétrer sereinement.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000340_ARENVALD<tab>With this power of mine, I can make a difference. If I stood idly by, I would regret it for the rest of my life.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000340_ARENVALD<tab>Il se trouve que c'est mon cas. Si je n'agis pas maintenant, je le regretterai le restant de mes jours.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000350_ALPHINAUD<tab>And you, Fordola? Is this what you want?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000350_ALPHINAUD<tab>Et toi, Fordola<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000360_FORDOLA<tab>What're you asking me for? It's not like I have any say in the matter.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000360_FORDOLA<tab>C'est évident, non<var 1D /var>? Je vais au casse-pipe, en échange de quoi on me laisse la vie sauve. C'est comme ça que ça marche dans l'unité disciplinaire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000370_ARENVALD<tab>Don't pretend. We both know Commander Aldynn gave you a chance to refuse. And you didn't.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000370_ARENVALD<tab>Elle a bon dos, l'unité disciplinaire... Je crois pourtant me souvenir que Raubahn t'a ex<var 16 /var>pres<var 16 /var>sé<var 16 /var>ment autorisée à passer ton tour.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000380_FORDOLA<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000380_FORDOLA<tab>Tsk.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000390_FORDOLA<tab>So the Empire's finished, is it? That's what they're all saying. That the great and glorious Garlemald slit its own throat.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000390_FORDOLA<tab>Je suis au courant pour Garlemald. Alors comme ça, l'Empire auquel je croyais... auquel nous croyions, cet Empire réputé in<var 16 /var>é<var 16 /var>bran<var 16 /var>la<var 16 /var>ble s'est effondré comme un vulgaire château de cartes...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000400_FORDOLA<tab>And now, from out of its twitching carcass crawls the Telophoroi, with bloody <var 1A 02 /var>Zenos<var 1A 01 /var> at its head.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000400_FORDOLA<tab>Si j'ai bien compris, ses fossoyeurs s'appellent les Télophores, et c'est le seigneu... (soupire) je veux dire, Zenos qui les dirige.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000410_FORDOLA<tab>I fought for Garlemald. Killed for Garlemald. What was I a part of? I need to know. Whatever it is...I need to know.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000410_FORDOLA<tab>Si c'est le cas, alors il faut que je découvre ce qui se cache dans ces fichues tours... que je comprenne enfin de quoi j'ai été complice.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000420_ALPHINAUD<tab>Very well. If your hearts are set on this, I shall not stand in your way.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000420_ALPHINAUD<tab>Merci pour ta franchise. Et désolé d'avoir douté de toi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000430_THANCRED<tab>If you've finished with your touching display of camaraderie, I have a question: which tower are you planning to investigate, exactly?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000430_THANCRED<tab>Et donc, vous avez décidé quelle tour vous alliez explorer<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000440_ARENVALD<tab>Well, the one in Gyr Abania's said to be tightly guarded. It's patrol after patrol out there, apparently. We'd be spotted before we got anywhere near it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000440_ARENVALD<tab>Eh bien, d'après nos in<var 16 /var>for<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>tions, de nombreux individus armés rôdent près de celle de Gyr Abania. Probablement des soldats garlemaldais.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000450_ARENVALD<tab>Which is why we've set our sights on the one in Paglth'an, instead. There shouldn't be anything like as many imperials to worry about down there.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000450_ARENVALD<tab>Le cordon de sécurité serait bien plus lâche autour de celle de Paglth'an. C'est donc là-bas que nous allons tenter notre chance.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000460_THANCRED<tab>Even so, I doubt the local Amalj'aa will look kindly on it if they catch you sneaking around in their territory.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000460_THANCRED<tab>La grande prairie de Paglth'an... C'est un territoire amalj'aa, ça. Vous ne risquez pas de vous attirer des ennuis<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000470_ARENVALD<tab>Fordola and I had a chance to learn the lie of the land in our previous forays there. We might still find trouble, but at least we won't lose our way.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000470_ARENVALD<tab>Je connais pas mal l'endroit, je m'y suis déjà rendu plusieurs fois pour des missions de sur<var 16 /var>veil<var 16 /var>lan<var 16 /var>ce. Ça devrait aller.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000480_ARENVALD<tab>Well, we'd best not keep them waiting any longer.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000480_ARENVALD<tab>Bien, il est temps de partir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000490_ALPHINAUD<tab>Mayhap when all of this is over, we could take another trip to Loch Seld. I would have you know I've become a rather capable swimmer since our last visit.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000490_ALPHINAUD<tab>Quand tout ça sera terminé, que dirais-tu de retourner avec moi au lac Seld<var 1D /var>? Je meurs d'envie de montrer mes progrès à mon ancien maître-nageur<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000500_ARENVALD<tab>Ha! I'll believe that when I see it! Though, to be fair, getting into deep water does seem to be a Scion's lot in life... Take care, eh?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000500_ARENVALD<tab>Haha, ce sera avec plaisir. Faites bien attention à vous, les amis. J'espère qu'on se reverra vite, et en un seul morceau<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000510_ARENVALD<tab>It means a lot, you know─you coming with me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000510_ARENVALD<tab>N'empêche, j'suis bien content que t'aies accepté cette mission.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000520_FORDOLA<tab>I still owe you for saving my skin, don't I? Can't return the favor if I'm not there.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000520_FORDOLA<tab>Vu que tu m'as sauvée la dernière fois, j'aurais mauvaise conscience si tu devais y rester maintenant. C'est l'unique raison de ma présence.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000530_ARENVALD<tab>I daresay you'll get your chance before long. That Fandaniel sounds like a tricky customer. Too much for the likes of me, anyway.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000530_ARENVALD<tab>Eh ben ça m'arrange. On sera pas trop de deux pour tenir tête à ce cinglé et à son dragon, si jamais on les croise.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000540_ARENVALD<tab>But we both know I'd be just another soldier if it weren't for my gift. And I need to be a damn sight more than that, given what's coming.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000540_ARENVALD<tab>Car oui... C'est dur à admettre, mais je suis loin d'être un foudre de guerre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000550_ARENVALD<tab>I realize I can't hold a candle to a hero like the Warrior of Light─or Alphinaud, for that matter. He might look like he's twelve, but he's seen more action than most people see in a lifetime.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000550_ARENVALD<tab>Tout le contraire de notre <var 08 E905 ((chère héroïne)) ((cher héros)) /var>... et d'Alphinaud aussi. Il est devenu si fort en combattant à ses côtés...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000560_ARENVALD<tab>No, the fact is, I'm nothing like them, and maybe I never will be, but I'll be damned if I don't try.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000560_ARENVALD<tab>Eux et moi, on ne joue pas dans la même cour, c'est certain. Mais je n'en reste pas moins un Héritier. Et j'ai toujours nourri mes propres ambitions héroïques, fussent-elles démesurées.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000570_ARENVALD<tab>They're counting on me. On us. So let's give it our all.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000570_ARENVALD<tab>J'y arriverai, j'en ai la conviction. Qu'importent mes lacunes, je prouverai à nos alliés qu'ils ont eu raison de compter sur moi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000580_ALPHINAUD<tab>He does not want for conviction, that much is certain. So let us have faith in him. Him and Fordola both.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000580_ALPHINAUD<tab>Bien. Faisons confiance à Arenvald et Fordola. Après tout, c'est leur décision et leur combat.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000590_ALPHINAUD<tab>While they see to the towers, I would attend to another task: chasing down this “Lunar” Bahamut.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000590_ALPHINAUD<tab>Pendant qu'ils se chargent des tours de l'apocalypse, je propose que nous nous lancions à la poursuite de Luna-Bahamut.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000600_TATARU<tab>(-Tataru-)(Ugh! Bloody thing...) Can you hear me? It's Tataru. I'm happy to say we managed to find Estinien!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000600_TATARU<tab>(-Voix de Tataru-)Allô, ici Tataru<var 1D /var>! Devinez quoi<var 1D /var>? Krile et moi, on a retrouvé Estinien<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000610_TATARU<tab>(-Tataru-)And...I'm sorry to say he went running off again the moment we told him about Bahamut.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000610_TATARU<tab>(-Voix de Tataru-)Enfin, retrouvé... puis reperdu. Sitôt qu'on lui a parlé de Luna-Bahamut, il a tourné les talons, et ce malgré nos protestations<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000620_TATARU<tab>(-Tataru-)But he did mutter something about heading to Ishgard, so if you're quick, you might still be able to catch him!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000620_TATARU<tab>(-Voix de Tataru-)Il a juste daigné nous dire qu'il se rendait à Ishgard. Si vous vous dépêchez, vous pourrez peut-être le devancer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000630_ALPHINAUD<tab>Even if we set out this instant, he may already have left by the time we arrive. Have her send the <var 1A 02 /var>Bonanza<var 1A 01 /var> to Ishgard. It may prove useful should we need to give chase.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000630_ALPHINAUD<tab>Dans ce cas, allons à Ishgard au plus vite. Par ailleurs, ce serait bien que Tataru nous envoie l'Aubaine, au cas où nous devrions poursuivre nos recherches hors de la cité.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000640_TATARU<tab>(-Tataru-)Gladly! I'll see to it as soon as Krile and I get back to the Rising Stones. Good luck!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000640_TATARU<tab>(-Voix de Tataru-)L'Aubaine<var 1D /var>? Je m'en occupe<var 1D /var>! Krile et moi allons retourner au Refuge des roches de ce pas. On compte sur vous pour l'attraper, ce malappris<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000650_THANCRED<tab>While you go off on your dragoon hunt, Urianger and I will return to headquarters. We have much to tell the others.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000650_THANCRED<tab>Urianger et moi, on rentre au bercail. Il faut qu'on raconte à Y'shtola tout ce qu'on vient d'entendre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000651_URIANGER<tab>I wish you every success in your search for our elusive friend. May we all meet again ere long.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000651_URIANGER<tab>J'espère que votre chasse au chevalier dragon sera fructueuse. Sur ce...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000660_ALISAIE<tab>No sign of him. Not that I've ever met him before. But the way Alphinaud goes on about him, I'm fairly sure I could pick him out in a crowd.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000660_ALISAIE<tab>Pas d'Estinien en vue... Du moins, personne qui correspond à la description qu'Alphinaud m'a faite de lui.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000670_GRAHATIA<tab>Speaking of which, it does seem awfully quiet. If the erstwhile Azure Dragoon had returned to Ishgard, would it not be a source of general excitement?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000670_GRAHATIA<tab>Tout est si calme... Si le Dragon céleste était vraiment dans les parages, je pense qu'on aurait déjà entendu quelque clameurrr à son sujet...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000680_ESTINIEN<tab>First the Scion's coinkeeper, and now you. I'm beginning to think these meetings are more than mere coincidence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000680_ESTINIEN<tab>Eh bien, c'est un vrai petit comité d'accueil. Ça me change de votre trésorière... Néanmoins, j'imagine que ces retrouvailles n'ont rien de fortuit.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000690_ESTINIEN<tab>Not that I'm complaining. It's been too long.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000690_ESTINIEN<tab>Bah, je ne vais pas bouder mon plaisir de revoir un visage familier.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000700_ALISAIE<tab>“Too long”?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000700_ALISAIE<tab>Un visage familier<var 1D /var>? Attendez un peu...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000710_ESTINIEN<tab>You look an ilm taller and twice as rugged. It suits you, Alphinaud.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000710_ESTINIEN<tab>Dis donc, Alphinaud, c'est moi ou les traits de ton visage se sont durcis<var 1D /var>? C'est à peine si je te reconnais...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000720_ESTINIEN<tab>Quieter, though. Have you been giving him lessons on how to be the strong, silent type?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000720_ESTINIEN<tab>Eh, camarade. C'est quoi son problème, au petit<var 1D /var>? Il a avalé sa langue<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000730_ALISAIE<tab>I...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000730_ALISAIE<tab>(grogne)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000740_ALISAIE<tab>...am not...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000740_ALISAIE<tab>JE NE SUIS PAS...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000750_ALISAIE<tab>ALPHINAUD!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000750_ALISAIE<tab>ALPHINAUD<var 1D /var>!!!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000760_ALISAIE<tab>If the two of you are such firm friends, perhaps you should remember what he looks like! And what do you mean, “rugged”!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000760_ALISAIE<tab>T'es assez proche de lui pour lui caresser la tête, et t'arrives même pas à le reconnaître<var 1D /var>!? Faut pas pousser<var 1D /var>! Et puis c'est quoi cette remarque de goujat<var 1D /var>!? Des “traits durcis”<var 1D /var>? Pff, n'importe quoi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000770_ALISAIE<tab>Ungh! Had my brother mentioned what an oaf you are, I'd never have bothered looking for you in the first place!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000770_ALISAIE<tab>Ça débarque à l'improviste, et ça se permet de balancer des “eh camarade” à notre <var 08 E905 ((amie)) ((ami)) /var><var 1D /var>!? Même moi, je me le permettrais pas, alors qu'on a lit<var 16 /var>té<var 16 /var>ra<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment élevé les porxies ensemble<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000780_GRAHATIA<tab>Estinien Wyrmblood, the Azure Dragoon... He who fought and felled the dread wyrm Nidhogg at the Warrior of Light's side!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000780_GRAHATIA<tab>Le grand Estinien<var 1D /var>! L'un des principaux acteurs de la Guerrre du chant des dragons<var 1D /var>! À la fois le tombeur de Nidhogg et l'instrument de sa vindicte<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000790_GRAHATIA<tab>To think the day would come when I should see this living legend with my own eyes!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000790_GRAHATIA<tab>L'inoubliable Dragon céleste en chair et en os<var 1D /var>! J'en frrrémis d'excitation<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000800_ESTINIEN<tab>Would someone mind explaining what is going on?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000800_ESTINIEN<tab>Mais c'est quoi leur problème, à ces deux-là<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000810_ALPHINAUD<tab>Is everything all right!? I thought I heard Alisaie shouting...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000810_ALPHINAUD<tab>Est-ce que ça va<var 1D /var>? J'ai entendu Alisaie crier...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000820_ALPHINAUD<tab>Estinien! It's been too long!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000820_ALPHINAUD<tab>Estinien<var 1D /var>! Nous vous avons cherché partout<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000830_ALPHINAUD<tab>No, no, it's quite understandable. That was hardly the first time we've been confused for one another. Nor, I suspect, will it be the last.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000830_ALPHINAUD<tab>Navré du quiproquo... Je pensais vous avoir déjà parlé de ma sœur jumelle, mais il faut croire que non.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000840_ESTINIEN<tab>Well I for one will not be making that mistake again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000840_ESTINIEN<tab>Ça faisait longtemps qu'on ne m'avait pas enguirlandé comme ça...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000850_ESTINIEN<tab>What I will say...for the second time today...is that you've grown. Inside and out. I can tell.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000850_ESTINIEN<tab>Ceci dit, j'aurais très bien pu t'adresser la même remarque qu'à ta sœur. Ton visage a changé, et en bien. Il respire davantage la maturité.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000860_ALPHINAUD<tab>One can't remain a spoiled little lordling forever, you know.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000860_ALPHINAUD<tab>Merci. Ça m'aurait embêté qu'on me voie toute ma vie comme un garçonnet<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000870_ALISAIE<tab>At least someone's having a good time...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000870_ALISAIE<tab>Regardez-le sur son petit nuage...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000880_ALISAIE<tab>You know, when we were growing up, Alphinaud would never befriend other boys because he couldn't stand the thought of not being in charge. But maybe that's changed. He seems just as happy around Estinien as he does Arenvald.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000880_ALISAIE<tab>Quand il était petit, Alphinaud n'aimait pas qu'on joue les grands frères avec lui. Ça le mettait très mal à l'aise. Alors qu'aujourd'hui, il s'ouvre volontiers à Arenvald, ou à cet Estinien...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que répondez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Perhaps he sees them as the brothers he never had.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ce sont ses confidents à lui.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I think he learned how to talk <var 1A 02 /var>with<var 1A 01 /var> people rather than <var 1A 02 /var>at<var 1A 01 /var> them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>C'est ce qu'on appelle devenir adulte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_A1_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Well...you can't keep him all to yourself forever.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_A1_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Tu te sens délaissée<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000890_ALISAIE<tab>Hmph. Good luck to them. It hasn't been easy being his sister, I can tell you that.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000890_ALISAIE<tab>Ils sont si proches que ça, tu crois<var 1D /var>?<var 1D /var>... Tu me diras, s'il est épanoui dans ses relations, je ne peux que m'en réjouir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000900_ALISAIE<tab>I wouldn't be so sure. He still loves nothing better than the sound of his own voice.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000900_ALISAIE<tab>Arrête, on croirait entendre Urianger... En plus, tu me donnes l'impression d'être encore une enfant.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000910_ALISAIE<tab>Keep him to my─!? You're joking, aren't you? I'd be <var 1A 02 /var>glad<var 1A 01 /var> if someone would take him off my hands!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000910_ALISAIE<tab>Mais pas du tout<var 1D /var>! Je dis simplement qu'Alphinaud a changé, commence pas à tout surinterpréter<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000920_ESTINIEN<tab>No rest for the righteous, eh? Speaking of which, I was just on my way to borrow an airship to take me to Azys Lla.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000920_ESTINIEN<tab>Je vois que vous n'avez pas chômé. Pour ma part, je comptais emprunter un aéronef pour me rendre à Azys Lla.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000930_ALPHINAUD<tab>Azys Lla...? How could I forget? The dragon with whom Bahamut shared the deepest of bonds...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000930_ALPHINAUD<tab>Azys Lla<var 1D /var>? Bon sang mais c'est bien sûr<var 1D /var>! Il y a une dragonne ancienne là-bas qui peut nous renseigner<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000940_ESTINIEN<tab>Aye, Tiamat, his mate. Even now, she remains imprisoned on Azys Lla, though her remorse binds her faster than any shackle.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000940_ESTINIEN<tab>Tiamat... La compagne de Bahamut, celle dont le chagrin l'a poussée à le ressusciter sous forme de Primordial. Aujourd'hui encore, elle demeure prisonnière sur le continent défendu.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000950_GRAHATIA<tab>I see... As the one who first summoned Bahamut, you believe she may be able to shine some light on his latest incarnation.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000950_GRAHATIA<tab>Je vois... La première invocatrice du Primordial Bahamut est sans doute la mieux placée pour comprendre la naturrre de cette nouvelle incarnation.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000960_ALPHINAUD<tab>Might I suggest that we make the journey to Azys Lla together? I'm not sure if Tataru mentioned this, but we Scions have an airship of our own now.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000960_ALPHINAUD<tab>Que diriez-vous d'y aller ensemble<var 1D /var>? Nous avons un aéronef à disposition.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000970_ESTINIEN<tab>I see no reason why not...assuming your sister can bear the thought of sharing a deck with me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000970_ESTINIEN<tab>Je n'ai aucune raison de refuser, mais... est-ce que ton adorable sœurette voudra bien de moi à bord<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000980_ALISAIE<tab>Be my guest. But confuse me with Alphinaud again, and I'll throw you overboard.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000980_ALISAIE<tab>Pourquoi pas... mais gare à toi si tu me confonds encore avec Alphinaud<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000990_ALISAIE<tab>Ugh! I don't know who he thinks he is, but he's nothing like Alphinaud painted him to be!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_000990_ALISAIE<tab>Ce qu'il m'agace avec son air cabotin<var 1D /var>! Et dire qu'on me l'a décrit comme quelqu'un de charmant...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001000_GRAHATIA<tab>I will admit, he is not exactly as I imagined him either. Based on what I had read of the man, I think I was expecting someone a little less...blunt?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001000_GRAHATIA<tab>C'est vrai qu'il est trrrès différent de l'image livresque que j'avais de lui... mais Alphinaud semble beaucoup l'apprécier, alors qui sait<var 1D /var>? Peut-être serons-nous à notre tour séduits à l'issue de cette aventure...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001010_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)My sire's mortal companion... What bringeth thee back to this forsaken place, child of man?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001010_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)<var 08 E905 ((La compagne)) ((Le compagnon)) /var> de route de mon père... Voilà une visite pour le moins inattendue. Que peux-tu bien vouloir à une dragonne au crépuscule de son existence<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001020_ESTINIEN<tab>Hmph. It's plain she knows naught of recent events. Perhaps you should enlighten her.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001020_ESTINIEN<tab>Elle n'a pas l'air au courant. Camarade, si tu veux bien te donner la peine de tout expliquer...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001030_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Ahhh... That my sins should be repeated...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001030_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Par Midgardsormr... Quelles terribles turpitudes<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001040_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)I sensed not the faintest stirring.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001040_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Au risque de vous décevoir, je n'ai perçu aucun signe de cette invocation, pas plus que je n'en suis à l'origine.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001050_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)As to who could have called him forth...I know of none save the dragons of Meracydia. Our children...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001050_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)À y réfléchir, je ne vois qu'un autre coupable potentiel<var 1D /var>: les dragons de Méracydia. Eux seuls vouent une dévotion aveugle à Bahamut.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001060_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)The eikon claimed their souls when first he manifested. And robbed of their will, they became tools for the Allagans' dark designs.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001060_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)La divinité guerrière qu'était devenu mon bien-aimé leur a octroyé sa bénédiction. Hélas, cela a corrompu leur esprit, les réduisant à l'état de marionnettes serviles. Pour finir, ils ont été capturés par les soldats allagois...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001070_ALISAIE<tab>Much like those held here in Azys Lla. If dragons who worship Bahamut are required to summon him, that must mean...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001070_ALISAIE<tab>Il y a de nombreux dragons à Azys Lla<var 1D /var>; beaucoup sont devenus les instruments de l'empire d'Allag, suite à des expériences de magismologie. S'il s'agit bien des fidèles de Bahamut, alors...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001080_ALISAIE<tab>I've seen it with my own eyes. Captives of a lost empire, neither alive nor dead, existing only to preserve Bahamut's corporeal form.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001080_ALISAIE<tab>Je me souviens que des dragons étaient retenus prisonniers dans une nef allagoise. Ils étaient maintenus en vie pour entretenir la manifestation physique de Bahamut, comme piégés dans un cauchemar sans fin...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001090_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Yes. The dragons of Meracydia are at the mercy of this Ascian. There can be no other explanation.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001090_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)L'Ascien nommé Fandaniel les aura découverts, et se sera servi d'eux pour son invocation...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001100_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Accursed Ascians! Vile minions of Darkness!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001100_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Les Asciens, ces suppôts des Ténèbres... Voilà qu'ils bafouent à nouveau la dignité des miens<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001110_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Again you would profane the memory of my beloved, and strip our children of their freedom, their dignity! Are there no depths to which you will not stoop!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001110_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)À cause d'eux, ces dragons ont été privés de leur liberté<var 1D /var>; ils se sont vu imposer une vie de sévices sans espoir de délivrance... et maintenant ça<var 1D /var>? Où s'arrêtera donc l'infamie<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001120_ESTINIEN<tab>Your children's pain means nothing to them. They laugh at your kind's suffering.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001120_ESTINIEN<tab>Oui, ces odieux comploteurs ajoutent l'ignominie à l'injure... C'est tout bonnement révoltant.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001130_ESTINIEN<tab>But tears will not right this wrong. Nor will lamentations see the perpetrators punished.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001130_ESTINIEN<tab>Cependant Tiamat, crois-tu vraiment que tes lamentations mettront un terme à la tragédie<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001140_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)What wouldst thou have from me, slayer of dragons?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001140_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)L'ancien avatar de Nidhogg... Précise ta pensée, chasseur de dragons.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001150_ESTINIEN<tab>Behavior befitting a great wyrm.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001150_ESTINIEN<tab>Des complaintes, toujours des complaintes... Je ne sais pas ce qu'il en est des autres, mais pour ma part, je ne suis pas venu écouter tes pleurs.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001160_ESTINIEN<tab>We came here to ask mighty Tiamat of the first brood, consort of Bahamut, mother of the dragons of Meracydia, what she intends to do about the crimes committed against her children!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001160_ESTINIEN<tab>Non... Si je suis ici, c'est parce que je me demande si la grande Tiamat – Tiamat la dragonne ancienne, Tiamat la mère des dragons de Méracydia, la tendre moitié de Bahamut – a encore un semblant de mordant en elle<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001170_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Were I free, I would answer thine insolence with fire. But words shall have to suffice.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001170_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Si cela m'était permis, j'aurais volontiers dissipé tes doutes et ton effronterie par mon souffle incandescent. Je devrai néanmoins me contenter de mots, prisonnière que je suis de mes chaînes.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001180_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Recall, mortals, that it was I who did first summon my beloved, praying with all my being to bring him forth. You who contend with eikons cannot well be ignorant of the consequence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001180_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Écoutez bien, humains. Quoi qu'il arrive, je suis et resterai celle qui a invoqué Bahamut. Les siècles auront beau défiler, rien n'effacera cette réalité. Savez-vous seulement ce que cela signifie<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001190_ALPHINAUD<tab>...You too were exposed to his influence. That you are yet in possession of your own will is testament to the indomitable strength of your soul.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001190_ALPHINAUD<tab>Que vous aussi avez baigné dans l'aura de la divinité guerrière... sans pour autant y succomber, votre âme de dragonne ancienne étant plus forte que celle des autres.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001200_ALPHINAUD<tab>But were you to meet with Bahamut again, you fear you might succumb.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001200_ALPHINAUD<tab>Mais que vous craignez qu'un nouveau face-à-face avec Bahamut n'ait définitivement raison de votre libre arbitre...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001210_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Indeed. Ask the dragonslayer, and he will tell thee the power we of the first brood wield. Were I to lose myself to the eikon's influence, all would pay the price.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001210_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Exactement. Chasseur de dragons, toi mieux que quiconque connais l'étendue de ma puissance... et du désastre qui surviendra si je ne suis plus capable de me contrôler<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001220_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)But it is of little matter. For even had I the strength to resist, I yet lack the strength to break my shackles. This prison shall be my tomb.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001220_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Fort heureusement, ces entraves sont aussi un rempart efficace contre le poison éthéré. Que cela te plaise ou non, ma place est désormais ici, et non plus dans les cieux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001230_ALISAIE<tab>On the matter of Bahamut's influence, at least, I believe we can be of some assistance.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001230_ALISAIE<tab>Quand bien même Tiamat serait subjuguée par Bahamut... nous devrions être capables de la ramener à la normale.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001240_ALISAIE<tab>If you're afraid of being enthralled, don't be─we have a cure. And while we've never tried it on one such as you, its basic principles are universal.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001240_ALISAIE<tab>Nous avons mis au point une méthode très efficace. Bien sûr, on ne l'a jamais essayée sur une dragonne ancienne, mais... en théorie, ça devrait marcher.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001250_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Speakest thou in earnest?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001250_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Frêle enfant... Ce que tu dis là... Est-ce vraiment possible<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001260_ALPHINAUD<tab>There is no future for those bound to the past.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001260_ALPHINAUD<tab>Si la vie m'a enseigné une leçon, c'est qu'il faut savoir accepter son passé pour pouvoir aller de l'avant.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001270_ALPHINAUD<tab>That you committed a terrible sin, I do not dispute. But if you feel remorse, you may yet make amends. We offer you that chance. Take it, or you will forever remain a prisoner, not of these cruel shackles, but of your own guilt.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001270_ALPHINAUD<tab>L'invocation de Bahamut était une erreur, vous l'avez admis sans détour. À présent, vous devez vous pardonner à vous-même. Sinon, votre cœur restera à jamais prisonnier, à l'image de votre corps.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001280_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)A chance to make amends... To lay Bahamut's memory to rest...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001280_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Me pardonner... Tu me demandes de me racheter, moi qui ai souillé l'âme de mon bien-aimé...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001290_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)When our own star faced annihilation, Hydaelyn granted us sanctuary. And now your foes would bring about Her destruction. This I cannot allow. For the debt I owe to Hydaelyn, and to all who have suffered for my sins...I shall fight with you, children of man.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001290_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Hydaelyn m'a recueillie en son sein, moi, l'exilée d'une planète mourante. À l'heure où de sombres individus veulent provoquer l'apocalypse en ses terres, il est de mon devoir de la défendre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001300_ALISAIE<tab>Ungh...! No... I'm almost there...!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001300_ALISAIE<tab>Urgh...<var 1D /var>! Si près du but...<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001310_ALISAIE<tab>This is it, Angelo!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001310_ALISAIE<tab>Un dernier effort... Va, Angelo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001320_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Yes...I feel it! The eikon's grip groweth weak!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001320_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Ah... Je le sens... L'ombre de la divinité factice se retire de mon être... Le poison qui me rongeait de l'intérieur est en train de s'évanouir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001330_ALISAIE<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001330_ALISAIE<tab>(halète)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001340_ALISAIE<tab>Did it work?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001340_ALISAIE<tab>(halète) Ça a marché...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001350_GRAHATIA<tab>We won't know for certain until the shackles are removed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001350_GRAHATIA<tab>Nous serrrons fixés une fois les entraves de Tiamat brisées. Croisons les doigts pour que tout se passe comme prévu.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001360_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Answer me this, children of man... Can my kindred be saved in like manner?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001360_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Dites-moi, humains... Votre familier serait-il en mesure de sauver les dragons de Méracydia qui ont servi à invoquer Luna-Bahamut<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001370_GRAHATIA<tab>Many have been subjected to the Allagans' dark arts, their flesh irrevocably altered. For such tortured souls, I fear there can be no salvation.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001370_GRAHATIA<tab>Mal<var 16 /var>heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, ils ont été dénaturés par les expériences des Allagois. Je doute qu'on puisse les guérrrir, quoique nous pourrions tenter notre chance, en espérant que certains aient été épargnés...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001380_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)My children...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001380_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Ah... C'est bien regrettable...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001390_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Should you hearken unto my call, we shall fly together once more. But should you not...I shall grant you peace.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001390_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Soit. Si une poignée daigne entendre mon appel, je leur garderai une place dans le ciel à mes côtés. Quant aux autres... Mes griffes leur offriront le repos qu'ils méritent.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001400_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Better to die than live as a tool of evil. You too would wish this, I know...and I shall do as I must.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001400_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Pour de fiers dragons comme eux, c'est un sort bien plus enviable qu'une vie de servitude. D'autant plus si c'est moi, leur mère, qui vient les délivrer...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001410_ALISAIE<tab>When that time comes, you won't be alone. We'll stand by you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001410_ALISAIE<tab>Je vous accompagnerai le moment venu. Maintenant que je sais votre peine, il est hors de question pour moi de vous laisser porter seule ce fardeau.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001420_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Thou hast my gratitude, little one.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001420_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Merci à toi, frêle humaine. Ta bonté me touche pro<var 16 /var>fon<var 16 /var>dé<var 16 /var>ment.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001430_ESTINIEN<tab>Alphinaud's ready. It's time.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001430_ESTINIEN<tab>Alphinaud est en position. C'est quand on veut.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001440_ESTINIEN<tab>Do it, and let's hope the treatment worked as it should.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001440_ESTINIEN<tab>Les jeux sont faits... Vas-y, mon garçon<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001450_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Bahamut...my beloved.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001450_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Ô Bahamut... Mon cher et tendre compagnon...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001460_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)For vengeance...and atonement...I rise.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001460_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Mon désespoir a engendré cette pâle copie de toi, et c'est pour la châtier qu'en ce jour glorieux, je m'en vais retrouver ma place dans les cieux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001470_ALISAIE<tab>By the gods...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001470_ALISAIE<tab>Elle est vraiment magnifique...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001480_GRAHATIA<tab>Urianger, your timing could not be better.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001480_GRAHATIA<tab>Urrrianger, c'est toi<var 1D /var>?<var 1D /var>... Oui, on a fini ici, pourquoi<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001490_GRAHATIA<tab>Understood, we're on our way.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001490_GRAHATIA<tab>D'accorrrd, on se met en route tout de suite.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001500_GRAHATIA<tab>It's Bahamut. He's been sighted over Paglth'an.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001500_GRAHATIA<tab>Apparemment, Luna-Bahamut a été aperçu au-dessus de la grande prrrairie de Paglth'an.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001510_GRAHATIA<tab>He flies for the largest Amalj'aa settlement in the region─at the head of a vast host, including dragons.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001510_GRAHATIA<tab>D'après Urianger, il est entouré d'une véritable escadrille de dragons, et se dirrrige vers le plus gros camp amalj'aa de la région.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001520_ESTINIEN<tab>Did you hear all that, Alphinaud? You'd best rejoin your comrades. I'll make my own way.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001520_ESTINIEN<tab>Tu as entendu ça<var 1D /var>? Dépêche-toi de rejoindre tes comparses. Moi, je crois que je vais plutôt faire équipe avec notre nouvelle alliée...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001530_ESTINIEN<tab>Our enemy awaits. Shall we?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001530_ESTINIEN<tab>L'occasion est trop belle pour ne pas en profiter... Vous permettez, Madame<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001540_TIAMAT<tab>Ascian vermin! You shall torment my children no longer!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001540_TIAMAT<tab>Méprisable Ascien<var 1D /var>! Je ne te laisserai pas humilier les miens davantage<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001550_TIAMAT<tab>Children of man... The shade of my beloved is no more, and I...I shall be forever in your debt.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001550_TIAMAT<tab>Je vous remercie, humains. Grâce à vous, cet infâme simulacre de Bahamut est enfin retourné à l'éther.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001560_TIAMAT<tab>By your deeds are we set free. And free we shall remain, as long as I draw breath. Never again shall the dragons of Meracydia hearken to the lies of the Ascians. This I vow.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001560_TIAMAT<tab>Plus jamais je ne laisserai les dragons de Méracydia tomber entre les griffes des Asciens. Aussi longtemps que mes ailes battront, je défendrai la liberté des miens. Je vous en fais la promesse solennelle.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001570_AMALJAACHIEFTAIN<tab>(-???-)Noble warriors! The dragons chose their friends well...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001570_AMALJAACHIEFTAIN<tab>(-???-)Vaillants humains, alliés de la grande dragonne, vous parler, j'aimerais.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001580_AMALJAACHIEFTAIN<tab>Long have our peoples waged war, but no more.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001580_AMALJAACHIEFTAIN<tab>Avec nos voisins uldiens, longtemps, le fer, nous avons croisé. Pourtant, et sans une once d'hésitation, à notre secours, vous avez volé. Profondément re<var 16 /var>con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>sants, nous vous en sommes.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001590_AMALJAACHIEFTAIN<tab>Your fallen lie beside our own. By our words and deeds shall we honor their sacrifice.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001590_AMALJAACHIEFTAIN<tab>Des pertes, votre camp lui aussi déplore. Sachez qu'un peuple guerrier, nous sommes, et que la valeur du sang versé, nous connaissons. Notre obligation envers vous, nous n'oublierons pas.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>You would make peace with Ul'dah then?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Envisageriez-vous de vous allier à Ul'dah<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>We would be proud to call you our allies.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Vos forces seraient un atout précieux pour l'Alliance.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_A2_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Then let us put the past behind us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_A2_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Vous savez ce qu'on dit à propos des ennemis d'hier...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001600_AMALJAACHIEFTAIN<tab>The enemy of our enemy is our friend, and you have proven yourselves worthy of our trust. It is the Garleans who are deserving of our fury.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001600_AMALJAACHIEFTAIN<tab>Que c'est l'Empire, et non pas vous, qui ravissait les nôtres, nous savons désormais. En faveur de votre camp, jouer, cet argument devrait.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001610_AMALJAACHIEFTAIN<tab>I shall see that my brethren learn the truth of this day, and rally as many as possible to the cause. Till we meet again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001610_AMALJAACHIEFTAIN<tab>Confiance, faites-moi. Qu'ils soient un ou cent, tous ceux qui adhèrent à votre cause, je mobiliserai. Ma parole, vous avez<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001620_GRAHATIA<tab>And thus did we make allies of the Amalj'aa...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001620_GRAHATIA<tab>Ça aura mis le temps, mais les Amalj'aa semblent enfin partis pour enterrrer la hache de guerre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001630_THANCRED<tab>It would certainly seem that way. The sultana <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> be pleased. Let's go and give her the good news, shall we?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001630_THANCRED<tab>Ça arrivera, et plus tôt qu'on ne le croit, j'en suis sûr. Venez, allons tout de suite transmettre cette bonne nouvelle à la Sultane.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001640_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Some time earlier, inside the Paglth'an tower...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001640_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Quelques heures auparavant, dans la tour de l'apocalypse de Paglth'an

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001650_ARENVALD<tab>What in Rhalgr's name happened here?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001650_ARENVALD<tab>(s'effraye) Qu'est-ce que c'est que ça...<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001660_FORDOLA<tab>The gods only know... But you can bet these poor sods aren't here by choice.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001660_FORDOLA<tab>Aucune idée. Mais ces hommes-bêtes ne se sont cer<var 16 /var>tai<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment pas encastrés là de leur plein gré...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001670_ARENVALD<tab>Quickly, we've got to get them free!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001670_ARENVALD<tab>Qu'importe, on doit les libérer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001680_FORDOLA<tab>Get back!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001680_FORDOLA<tab>Recule<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001690_ARENVALD<tab>No... What have I done?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001690_ARENVALD<tab>C'est pas vrai... Il... Il est mort<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001700_FORDOLA<tab>It's too late for them! We're leaving. Now!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001700_FORDOLA<tab>On le pleurera plus tard si tu veux bien<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001710_FORDOLA<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001710_FORDOLA<tab>Merde<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001720_ARENVALD<tab>No subtitles. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001720_ARENVALD<tab>Hiyaaaaaaaaah<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001730_ARENVALD<tab>Don't you dare! We came together, and we're leaving together!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001730_ARENVALD<tab>Je te protégerai<var 1D /var>!<var 1D /var>... Moi aussi, j'en suis capable<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001740_ALPHINAUD<tab>Fordola... Have you been waiting here all this time?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001740_ALPHINAUD<tab>Fordola... Tu es restée pendant tout ce temps...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001750_DAMIELLIOT<tab>We have done what we can. The rest is up to him.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001750_DAMIELLIOT<tab>Nous avons fait tout ce que nous avons pu. Hélas, votre ami est toujours dans un état incertain...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001760_ALPHINAUD<tab>May we see him?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001760_ALPHINAUD<tab>Pourrions-nous le voir brièvement<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001770_DAMIELLIOT<tab>I...do not think that wise. You must let him sleep.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001770_DAMIELLIOT<tab>Navré, il vaut mieux le laisser se reposer pour l'instant.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001780_ALPHINAUD<tab>Thank you for bringing him back. He owes you his life.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001780_ALPHINAUD<tab>Merci, Fordola. Sans toi, il y serait resté.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001790_ALPHINAUD<tab>I just... I just <var 1A 02 /var>wish<var 1A 01 /var> I'd been there. Perhaps─ I don't know. Perhaps I could have...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001790_ALPHINAUD<tab>Je... Je m'en veux tellement... Si seulement j'avais été là, moi aussi... j'aurais pu l'aider...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001800_FORDOLA<tab>Could've what? Got tempered!? Don't flatter yourself. You can't save everyone. No one can. Not even the Warrior of bloody Light.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001800_FORDOLA<tab>Commence pas, hein<var 1D /var>! Personne peut sauver tout le monde, tu m'entends<var 1D /var>!? Ni toi... ni même <var 08 E905 ((madame l'héroïne ici présente)) ((monsieur le héros ici présent)) /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001810_FORDOLA<tab>People die all the time. For no good reason. And those who take up the sword die quicker than most.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001810_FORDOLA<tab>Des gens meurent... bêtement, cruellement parfois. Voilà ce qui arrive quand on met sa vie en jeu<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001820_FORDOLA<tab>If you're going to shed a tear every time a soldier falls on the battlefield, you'd best stay away. It's no place for the weak of heart.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001820_FORDOLA<tab>Personne ne s'étonne de voir des cadavres sur un champ de bataille, si<var 1D /var>? Alors pourquoi il faudrait se morfondre sur le sort d'une victime en particulier<var 1D /var>!? C'est com<var 16 /var>plè<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment ridicule<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001830_ALPHINAUD<tab>It may be...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001830_ALPHINAUD<tab>Je ne suis pas d'accord<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001840_ALPHINAUD<tab>That victory cannot be won without cost.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001840_ALPHINAUD<tab>C'est une longue et âpre lutte que nous menons pour notre avenir. Nous avons perdu des camarades en cours de route... et nous en perdrons sans doute encore...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001850_ALPHINAUD<tab>But all life is precious, and I refuse to shrug at its loss!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001850_ALPHINAUD<tab>Mais de là à banaliser leur sacrifice... à parler de mal nécessaire... Ça non, je ne peux pas... je ne veux pas m'y résoudre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001860_FORDOLA<tab>“All life is precious”? Hmph. You need to grow up, little man─before your sparkling ideals get everyone killed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001860_FORDOLA<tab>Alors tant pis. Tôt ou tard, ton sentimentalisme et ton indécision te perdront.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001870_ESTINIEN<tab>You're right. He <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> idealistic. But the world has more than its fair share of realists like you and me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001870_ESTINIEN<tab>Eh bien, tu ne mâches pas tes mots. Je te rejoins en grande partie sur le fond, mais garde à l'esprit que tout le monde n'est pas endurci comme toi et moi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001880_ESTINIEN<tab>It's people like him who dare to dream that things could be better─and make it happen, against all the odds. They are the ones whose names live on forever. The heroes.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001880_ESTINIEN<tab>Et puis, s'accrocher jusqu'au bout à ses espoirs, aussi irraisonnables et irréalisables soient-ils, n'est-ce point la définition même de l'héroïsme<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001890_FORDOLA<tab>The battlefield's littered with would-be heroes. At this rate, you lot'll be next.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001890_FORDOLA<tab>Tout le monde ne peut pas être un héros. S'ils continuent comme ça, ils vont tous y passer, point barre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001900_FORDOLA<tab>And what'll become of your precious dreams then!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001900_FORDOLA<tab>À ce moment-là, que deviendront leurs beaux idéaux à ton avis<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001910_FORDOLA<tab>They'll be gone─like dust on the wind!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001910_FORDOLA<tab>Je vais te le dire<var 1D /var>: ils disparaîtront purement et simplement, voilà tout<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001920_ESTINIEN<tab>Dreams worth fighting for don't die so easily.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001920_ESTINIEN<tab>Ça, ou ils feront de la résistance...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001930_ALPHINAUD<tab>Your Grace. Pray forgive us our lateness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001930_ALPHINAUD<tab>Dame Nanamo, navré de vous avoir fait attendre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001940_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Think not of that. I understand a close comrade of yours was wounded in the line of duty. Arenvald.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001940_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Ce n'est rien... Nous sommes au courant pour votre ami.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001950_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>It was at the Alliance's behest that he risked all, and we are grieved to hear of his condition. Rest assured, he will receive the finest care our chirurgeons can provide, on that you have my word.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001950_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>C'est l'Alliance éorzéenne qui lui a ordonné de se rendre dans la tour de l'apocalypse. En ce sens, nous avons une part de res<var 16 /var>pon<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>bi<var 16 /var>li<var 16 /var>té dans ce qui lui est arrivé. Nous prierons pour son réta<var 16 /var>blis<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, et fournirons tous les moyens nécessaires pour le soigner.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001960_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Now...we would share with you the findings of the mission.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001960_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>À présent, si vous voulez bien excuser notre indélicatesse, il y a un autre sujet qu'il nous faut aborder de toute urgence.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001970_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Pipin─pray relate to our guests the details of Fordola's account.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001970_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Nous voulons parler de ce que Fordola a vu dans la tour.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001980_THANCRED<tab>First Bahamut, now Ifrit. Or “Lunar Ifrit,” as Fandaniel would doubtless have it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001980_THANCRED<tab>D'abord Bahamut, et maintenant Ifrit... ou devrais-je dire “Luna-Ifrit”<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001990_URIANGER<tab>'Tis now all but certain that the towers were conceived to facilitate the summoning of primals by those imprisoned within.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_001990_URIANGER<tab>Les tours de l'apocalypse seraient donc des prisons forçant leurs captifs à invoquer des Primordiaux...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002000_URIANGER<tab>Less certain is the means by which the Telophoroi constrain the wills of said entities to enact <var 1A 02 /var>their<var 1A 01 /var> designs in defiance of the pleas of their victims.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002000_URIANGER<tab>J'imagine que les entités ainsi créées obéissent na<var 16 /var>tu<var 16 /var>rel<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment aux Télophores.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002010_YSHTOLA<tab>Mayhap they do not. If mere proximity to the towers is enough to make loyal servants of the Empire's mortal enemies, it stands to reason that the same is true for those held captive.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002010_YSHTOLA<tab>Les tours sont assez puissantes pour assujettir quiconque s'en approche. Les Amalj'aa étaient sans doute déjà devenus les pions de Zenos et de ses acolytes.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002020_YSHTOLA<tab>They invoke their gods for the good of Garlemald, and in their disturbed state of mind summon a primal whose form reflects their own alteration.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002020_YSHTOLA<tab>Quant aux Primordiaux, leur forme dépend de la volonté qui les engendre. Si cette volonté est pliée, cela peut ef<var 16 /var>fec<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>ve<var 16 /var>ment donner un résultat inattendu...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002030_THANCRED<tab>It all begins to make sense. Upon closer inspection, I realized that the towers bear a striking resemblance to a much larger structure which Urianger and I observed from afar during our visit to the imperial capital.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002030_THANCRED<tab>À Garlemald, Urianger et moi avons aperçu un édifice qui ressemblait plus ou moins aux tours, mais qui était bien plus grand cependant.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002040_THANCRED<tab>Assuming it too is capable of tempering those in its immediate vicinity, it would go some way to explain the swiftness with which the Telophoroi managed to rally so many imperials to their cause.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002040_THANCRED<tab>S'il est doté des mêmes capacités de contrôle mental, je comprends mieux pourquoi les Télophores ont autant de soutien dans la capitale.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002050_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>While the situation in Garlemald is indeed troubling, I fear we have more immediate concerns.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002050_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>La situation là-bas est pour le moins déconcertante, nous vous l'accordons. Mais ce n'est pas ce qui nous préoccupe le plus présentement.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002060_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Ifrit was not the only primal summoned. At approximately the same time, observers at several other towers bore witness to the emergence of further such entities.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002060_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Figurez-vous qu'Ifrit n'est pas le seul à avoir été invoqué. Peu après l'incident de la tour, nous avons reçu de multiples signalements de “Néo-Primordiaux” en provenance d'un peu partout.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002070_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>For a blessing, none appear to wield aught approaching the destructive power of Bahamut, and the Grand Companies are moving to deal with the threat even as we speak.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002070_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Par chance, ces incarnations-là ne sont apparemment pas aussi redoutables que Luna-Bahamut. Au moment où nous vous parlons, les grandes compagnies éorzéennes mobilisent toutes leurs forces pour les vaincre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>You need only tell me where they are, Your Grace...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Nous allons leur venir en aide.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>The Grand Companies, Your Grace? Is that wise?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ont-elles une chance de l'emporter<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002080_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Though we are aware that the task will not be easy, we would call upon the Scions only as a last resort. Pray conserve your strength for now.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002080_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Sans parler de victoire assurée, nous sommes pour l'heure plutôt sereine, assez en tout cas pour ne pas nous en remettre une énième fois aux Héritiers. Faites-nous donc le plaisir de vous reposer, pour changer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002090_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>After all, it was not so very long ago that you rid us of Bahamut. On which note, I am pleased to report that our talks with the Amalj'aa have reached an agreeable conclusion. They have pledged their full support to our cause.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002090_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Qui plus est, cette crise est l'occasion idéale de cimenter notre amitié avec les Amalj'aa. À quelque chose malheur est bon.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002100_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>It is our hope that this historic agreement will encourage other tribes to join us at the negotiating table. And I know that I speak for all of the Allied leaders when I say that we will welcome them with open arms at such time as they do.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002100_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Une victoire commune encouragerait les autres tribus à leur emboîter le pas. C'est là toute la vocation de l'Alliance et de ses dirigeants<var 1D /var>: bâtir une or<var 16 /var>ga<var 16 /var>ni<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>tion qui réunirait l'ensemble des peuples d'Éorzéa.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002110_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Of course, this was only made possible by the feats of heroism performed at Paglth'an. Moreover, we shall not allow the sacrifices of those fallen in battle to have been made in vain. As hope leads to victory, shall victory lead to a new dawn for Eorzea.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002110_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Un premier pas a été réalisé en direction des Amalj'aa, et c'est à vous, à Arenvald et à Fordola que nous le devons. Dorénavant, notre mission est de faire fructifier cet espoir pour façonner le monde de demain.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002120_YSHTOLA<tab>May these words ever be our guide, Your Grace.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002120_YSHTOLA<tab>Vous avez tout mon soutien, Votre Majesté.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002130_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Now, if you will forgive me, I must consult with the Syndicate on the matter of our new allies' integration. Till next we meet, my friends, I bid you safe travels and blessed respite.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002130_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Sur ce, veuillez nous excuser, mais nous devons recevoir d'urgence le Cartel des Scorpions. La politique intérieure n'attend pas<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002140_KRILE<tab>Welcome back. I expect you must all be exhausted. Ere you take your rest, however, I would beg a moment of your time.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002140_KRILE<tab>Bienvenue tout le monde<var 1D /var>! Et désolée d'avance... Je sais que vous êtes fourbus et que vous avez envie de vous reposer, mais j'ai à vous parler.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002150_KRILE<tab>Thanks to Arenvald's selfless efforts, we may now be confident that we understand the function of the towers. But many questions remain regarding the reason for the summonings and what lurks behind the looming edifice in Garlemald.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002150_KRILE<tab>Arenvald a payé de sa personne pour nous éclairer sur le rôle des tours, et je l'en remercie. Pour autant, il reste de nombreux mystères à élucider, notamment leur lien avec le grand édifice de la capitale impériale, ainsi que le pourquoi de ces invocations de Primordiaux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002160_KRILE<tab>Until such questions are answered, we will struggle to devise an effective strategy for thwarting the Telophoroi's stated aim: nothing less than the destruction of this star. And so, given the gravity of the situation...I move that we petition the aid of Sharlayan.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002160_KRILE<tab>Le savoir est une arme à ce qu'on dit. Dans ce cas, je pense que nous devrions demander de l'aide à ses plus grands dépositaires<var 1D /var>: les Sharlayanais. C'est à mes yeux le meilleur moyen de remporter cette guerre et de sauver Éorzéa.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002170_URIANGER<tab>'Tis possible the ancient knowledge preserved within their archives may hide a clue to our enemy's methods. But given Sharlayan's established policy of nonintervention, our former colleagues are not like to aid us in its discovery.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002170_URIANGER<tab>Certes, l'immense réservoir de con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>san<var 16 /var>ces de Sharlayan pourrait s'avérer utile pour démêler cet écheveau complexe. Mais encore faudrait-il que les gardiens du temple acceptent de nous en ouvrir les portes...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002180_KRILE<tab>Oh, I well remember what they're like. The Forum's barefaced refusal to assist you in the days prior to the Calamity must rank as Sharlayan's most shameful act since the exodus.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002180_KRILE<tab>Oui, je sais. Inutile de me reparler du grand exode, ou de cette sacro-sainte politique de non-ingérence qui n'a pas bougé d'un iota depuis tout ce temps. Vous pensez bien que tout cela m'a traversé l'esprit.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002190_KRILE<tab>But were the Final Days to be reenacted, it would spell doom for us all. Surely even they cannot turn a blind eye to that.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002190_KRILE<tab>Mais vous savez comme moi que les tours de l'apocalypse et les Néo-Primordiaux sont apparus partout dans le monde. Face au spectre d'une catastrophe à échelle planétaire, je me dis que la posture des Sharlayanais pourrait bien évoluer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002200_KRILE<tab>I trust we are all of the same mind on this matter... Urgent as it seemed, I took the liberty of petitioning the Alliance for leave to act as Eorzea's emissary. And have since received their blessing.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002200_KRILE<tab>Pour tout vous dire, j'ai déjà fait part de mon idée à l'Alliance éorzéenne, et obtenu l'aval de ses dirigeants. C'est moi qui me rendrai à Sharlayan, en qualité d'émissaire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002210_GRAHATIA<tab>I presume your role as a Student of Baldesion will carry some weight with the Forum?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002210_GRAHATIA<tab>Je prrrésume que tu représenteras également les Élèves de Baldesion<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002220_KRILE<tab>One can but hope. If truth be told, our organization has been a shadow of its former self ever since the disappearance of the Isle of Val─but the name does still retain some degree of prestige. I only pray it will be enough.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002220_KRILE<tab>Oui, tant qu'à faire... Seulement, nous ne sommes plus très actifs depuis que notre quartier général sur l'île de Val a disparu. Notre voix ne compte plus autant qu'avant, j'en ai peur...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002230_KRILE<tab>If there are no objections, I shall depart for Sharlayan at once. But before I do, I should also mention the other matter to which I would devote some time during my stay.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002230_KRILE<tab>Quoi qu'il en soit, il y a une autre raison pour laquelle je veux aller là-bas<var 1D /var>; un point que j'aimerais éclaircir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002240_KRILE<tab>After hearing what transpired in the First, I began to question the true nature of Hydaelyn's blessing. A topic I have discussed at some length with Y'shtola...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002240_KRILE<tab>Les autres et toi, vous m'avez raconté vos aventures dans le premier reflet. Et il y a un détail que j'ai du mal à m'expliquer. J'en ai déjà discuté avec Y'shtola, ça concerne la bénédiction de la Lumière...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002250_YSHTOLA<tab>We were wondering: when was the last time Hydaelyn spoke to you directly?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002250_YSHTOLA<tab>En fait, on aurait une question pour toi, <var 08 E905 ((la principale intéressée)) ((le principal intéressé)) /var>. La dernière fois qu'Hydaelyn t'a <var 08 E905 ((contactée)) ((contacté)) /var>, c'était quand<var 1D /var>? Tu te souviens<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que répondez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Near the end of the Dragonsong War.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Il y a longtemps déjà, pendant la Guerre du chant des dragons.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>That day in the Crystarium.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Eh bien, à Cristarium, l'autre fois...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_A4_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_A4_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002260_YSHTOLA<tab>When you regained Her blessing, was it not? But never since─not in all your time in the First, when you faced the unsundered, the very heart of Zodiark.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002260_YSHTOLA<tab>Oui, c'était lorsque tu as retrouvé la bénédiction de la Lumière, à Azys Lla. Elle ne s'est plus jamais manifestée depuis, ni pendant ton séjour dans le premier reflet, ni lors de tes combats contre les Asciens originels.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002270_YSHTOLA<tab>When Elidibus sought to make Warriors of Light? That was the voice which calls constantly to all who might hear it. I spoke of <var 1A 02 /var>direct<var 1A 01 /var> communication, when Hydaelyn communed solely with you. A far rarer occurrence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002270_YSHTOLA<tab>Tu veux parler du moment où les Cristariens se sont éveillés à l'Écho<var 1D /var>? Comme l'a dit Urianger, ce que tu as entendu était pro<var 16 /var>ba<var 16 /var>ble<var 16 /var>ment une sorte de signal continu provenant de la planète. Ce n'est pas comme si Hydaelyn s'était véritablement adressée à toi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002280_YSHTOLA<tab>Is the question truly so vexing? Perhaps you fear I will chastise you for giving the wrong answer? Or was it so long ago that you simply can't remember...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002280_YSHTOLA<tab>Tu as le droit de me répondre, tu sais<var 1D /var>? Et même de te tromper, je ne vais pas te taper sur les doigts... À moins que tu aies oublié tellement ça remonte à loin<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002290_KRILE<tab>History shows us that Hydaelyn is able to awaken the Echo in Her chosen, convey Her will directly, and grant the blessing of Light.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002290_KRILE<tab>Jusqu'alors, Hydaelyn s'était toujours employée à encourager l'éveil au pouvoir de l'Écho. Parfois, il lui arrivait de communiquer directement sa volonté, ou bien d'accorder la bénédiction de la Lumière.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002300_KRILE<tab>To our knowledge, however, She has not sought to intervene in man's affairs for some considerable time.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002300_KRILE<tab>Or, il n'y a pas eu de signe d'elle depuis un bon bout de temps. Aucune manifestation directe, tout du moins.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002310_URIANGER<tab>Might not the explanation for that lie with Her choice of champion? Mayhap She is content to trust in <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> judgment.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002310_URIANGER<tab>Est-ce à dire qu'elle ne guide plus ceux qui ont reçu sa bénédiction<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05500_002320_YSHTOLA<tab>Mayhap She is. But following my initial discussion with Krile, I made inquiries of my own, and as far as I am able to tell, Hydaelyn has not made Her will known to anyone.
